text: Alfred G. Gettins (July 1886 – 1949) was an English footballer who played for Bolton Wanderers, Blackpool, Luton Town, Queens Park Rangers, Aston Villa, Brighton & Hove Albion, Fulham, Portsmouth, Partick Thistle and Dumbarton. ==References== Category:1886 births Category:1949 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Manchester Category:English footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Partick Thistle F.C. players Category:Bolton Wanderers F.C. players Category:Queens Park Rangers F.C. players Category:Aston Villa F.C. players Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:Blackpool F.C. players Category:Luton Town F.C. players Category:Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:Stenhousemuir F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Date of death missing Category:Place of death missing Category:Association football forwards
title: Alfred Gettins
